name: New York Times Digital Access
description: Complimentary 72-hour digital access to The New York Times online (articles, cooking, games, archives)
fullDescription: California State Library provides free digital access to The New York Times for all Californians through participating public libraries.
whatTheyOffer:
- Full access to NYTimes.com
- New York Times Cooking
- New York Times Games (Wordle, crosswords)
- Archives back to 1851
- 72-hour passes, renewable unlimited times
howToGetIt:
1. Visit your library's website or the State Library's NYT page
2. Click the link to access the New York Times
3. Create a free NYT account or log in
4. Enjoy 72 hours of full access
5. Return to library site to renew when pass expires
keywords: New York Times, NYT, newspaper, free news, Wordle, crossword, cooking, games, California State Library, digital access
